author: Liam Britten
title: 'Everyone is going home': Coronavirus pandemic leaves workers scrambling in B.C. ski hotspot
description: In Whistler, March usually brings with it spring break visitors chasing the last days of snow, but this year, the village’s streets, shops and restaurants are practically empty.
content:
For the numerous expats and foreign workers that keep Whistler and its ski hills running, it's time to go home.
Dutch ski instructor Sebastian Vansoest says that means staying right here.
"I can go home [to the Netherlands] but it doesn't really make sense,… [+2632 chars]
